pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Toolbox for Conditional Inference Trees and Random Forests // Additions to 'party' and 'partykit' packages : tools for the interpretation of forests (surrogate trees, prototypes, etc.), feature selection (see Gregorutti et al (2017) doi:10.48550/arXiv.1310.5726, Hapfelmeier and Ulm (2013) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2012.09.020, Altmann et al (2010) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btq134) and parallelized versions of conditional forest and variable importance functions. Also modules and a shiny app for conditional inference trees.
